meanings.definition: A salt or ester of carbamic acid.
meanings.sent1: I learned about carbamates in my chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of different carbamates.
meanings.sent3: The carbamates in the lab were having a party.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a bouquet of colorful carbamates.
meanings.sent5: The smell of carbamates filled the room, reminding me of my science project.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of organic compounds containing the carbamate group.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist explained the benefits of using carbamates in medicine.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use carbamates to protect their crops from pests.
meanings.sent3: The carbamates in the field were chatting about photosynthesis.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were a mixture of creativity and practicality, like carbamates in chemistry.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bottles on the shelf contained various carbamates for different experiments.
